Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • Messenger
      • Request

  • public class Request
extends Messenger
    Requestclass extends messenger class. It moves around and searches nodes for information about a specific event

      • Request

        public Request(int id,
       Node n)
        Constructor for Request.
        Parameters:
        id - The event-id to search for
        n - The starting node

    • Method Detail

      • checkEvent

        private void checkEvent()
        A method to to check each node if the event is reached

      • dumpInfo

        private void dumpInfo()
        A method to use when Request has returned. If it returns for the first time it tries again to find its event. If it has found its event it writes the information to the console

      • move

        public void move()
        This method simulates a move the Request makes from one node to another.
        Overrides:
        move in class Messenger
